name: Elements (ElementsGame)
description:
Elements is a game where player controls a floating orb that can change the element of which is made, using that to solve the puzzles and finding a way through nature.

The game was created in a GameJam by a team made of 3 people.

GameJam rules:

  • Theme: "All is elemental"
  • Graphic engine: Unity
  • Time: 5 days
  • Interactive Main Menu
